articles.description: Follow live commentary and text updates as Liverpool host West Ham in the EFL Cup quarter-final.
articles.title: EFL Cup quarter-finals: Liverpool v West Ham - radio & text

articles.description: Follow live text commentary of Barcelona's match against Almeria in La Liga, with Bayern Munich's trip to Wolfsburg coming up.
articles.title: Barcelona v Almeria, followed by Wolfsburg v Bayern Munich

articles.description: Follow radio and text updates of Aberdeen v Livingston and Rangers v St Johnstone.
articles.title: Scottish Premiership: Rangers host St Johnstone & Livingston visit Aberdeen

articles.description: From abandoned baby to world record holder, Fatima Whitbread's story is one of triumphing over adversity.
articles.title: 'Her will to succeed was born from her will to survive'

articles.description: Shane Lowry says he is "not surprised by anything that happens at the minute" as he discussed Ryder Cup team-mate Jon Rahm's decision to leave the PGA Tour for LIV Golf.
articles.title: Lowry 'not surprised' by Rahm's LIV Golf move

articles.description: Luton Town's match at Bournemouth, abandoned after their captain Tom Lockyer collapsed on the pitch, is to be replayed in full, says the Premier League.
articles.title: Bournemouth-Luton abandoned game to be replayed in full

articles.description: England goalkeeper Mary Earps says some speculation regarding her future at Manchester United has been an "injustice" and "a lot of stuff isn't true".
articles.title: Earps says Man Utd future rumours 'an injustice'

articles.description: Former Wales and Crystal Palace assistant boss Osian Roberts is named caretaker manager of Italian Serie B side Como.
articles.title: Roberts named caretaker boss of Italian side Como

articles.description: Exeter Chiefs forward Aidon Davis announces he is receiving treatment for non-Hodgkin's lymphoma.
articles.title: Exeter forward Davis receiving cancer treatment

articles.description: Stephen Curry scores a game-high 33 points to guide the Golden State Warriors to a dramatic overtime win against the Boston Celtics.
articles.title: NBA: Stephen Curry top-scores for Golden State Warriors in overtime win
